snippet: Representative Ron Paul was running neck and neck with Newt Gingrich in Nevada's caucuses on Saturday, outpacing both the expectations of pollsters and his own performance here four years ago.
abstract: Representative Ron Paul was running neck and neck with Newt Gingrich in Nevada's caucuses on Saturday, outpacing both the expectations of pollsters and his own performance here four years ago.

headline.main: Strong Showing for Paul Validates Nevada Bet
